property.name: description
property.value: Exec starts a shell command and connects to the process' stdin and stdout. This accessor implements an interface to the shell of the host. It takes a command and starts it as a process. It connects the process' stdin and stdout to the accessor ports with the same name. FIXME: Provide a selection of shells (e.g., bash, awk, etc)

property.name: stdin (port)
property.value: The stdin of the executing process. A token received on this port is interpreted as a line entered in stdin of the process.

property.name: stdout (port)
property.value: The stdout of the executing process. Each line read from the executing process is sent out as a token from this port.
